verbs.description: it [V: has] been one year since the las vegas shooting rocked the us here exactly how the nation worst modern gun massacre unfolded a gunman in las vegas carried out the deadliest mass shooting in modern american history on october 1 2017 58 people died and more than 800 people were injured by stephen paddock whose motive remains a mystery a year later stephen paddock las vegas strip las vegas metropolitan police department us las vegas one year mandalay bay
